Ritualist:DarkRitual.NAME: Dark Ritual

Ritualist:DarkRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 2 warlock:Ritual. NL Gain [G] [G]. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.

Ritualist:SummonAgiel.NAME: Summon Agiel
Ritualist:SummonAgiel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL warlock:Summon: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ScaryShank.NAME: Scary Shank
Ritualist:ScaryShank.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.NAME: Ritual Bloodletter
Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this is your last card, gain [G] [G] and draw 2 cards.
Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is your last card in hand, NL Gain [G] [G] [G] and draw 2 cards.

Ritualist:EmptyPalms.NAME: Empty Palms
Ritualist:EmptyPalms.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, when you have no cards in hand, gain !B! Block.

Ritualist:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
Ritualist:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a Ritual, gain !B! Block.

Ritualist:ImpFeast.NAME: Imp Feast
Ritualist:ImpFeast.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 warlock:Possession to all enemies. They lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.NAME: Costly Preparation
Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Lose up to 4 warlock:Attunement. Draw that many cards +1 next turn.
Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: warlock:2 Ritual. NL Lose up to 4 warlock:Attunement. Draw that many cards +1 next turn.

Ritualist:TemporalRites.NAME: Temporal Rites

Ritualist:ScoutAhead.NAME: Scout Ahead
Ritualist:ScoutAhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

Ritualist:BranchingPaths.NAME: Branching Paths
Ritualist:BranchingPaths.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

Ritualist:SoulOpening.NAME: Soul Opening
Ritualist:SoulOpening.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL If target is Possessed, apply !M! warlock:Possession.

Ritualist:TwistedEcstasy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, your Rituals cost 0. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:MassDrainLife.NAME: Mass Drain Life
Ritualist:MassDrainLife.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to and consume all warlock:Possession from each enemy. Heal HP equal to the amount consumed. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.NAME: Pull From Beyond
Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your deck. Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Put a card from your exhaust and discard pile into your deck. Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ThoughtfulArt.NAME: Thoughtful Art
Ritualist:ThoughtfulArt.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you've played more than !M! cards this turn, gain !B! block again and draw 1 card.

Ritualist:PowerPact.NAME: Power Pact
Ritualist:PowerPact.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !M! Strength. In three turns lose !M+2! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.NAME: Deadly Velocity
Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity until the end of the turn.
Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity until the end of the turn.

Ritualist:DemonArm.NAME: Demon Arm
Ritualist:DemonArm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, deal !M! damage to 1 random enemy.

Ritualist:WinningGambit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Play the top card of your draw pile.

Ritualist:LongCon.NAME: Long Con
Ritualist:LongCon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. In two turns, gain [G] [G].

Ritualist:Retreat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! cards from your draw pile on top of it and upgrade them.

Ritualist:DrainStrength.NAME: Drain Strength
Ritualist:DrainStrength.DESCRIPTION: Remove up to !M! warlock:Possession from an enemy. Gain that much Strength. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:CleanseByBlood.NAME: Cleanse By Blood
Ritualist:CleanseByBlood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. warlock:Banish a summoned demon.

Ritualist:GrowingRites.NAME: Growing Rites

Ritualist:Arrival.NAME: Arrival

Ritualist:Arrival.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. NL Put 1 Summon card from your discard and draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:TwinWave.NAME: Twin Wave

Ritualist:DeadlyBlows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Exhaust a random card.
Ritualist:DeadlyBlows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Exhaust a card.

Ritualist:EvilIntentions.NAME: Evil Intentions
Ritualist:EvilIntentions.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2 cards. NL Gain [G] [G] [G]. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:BloodBoil.NAME: Blood Boil
Ritualist:BloodBoil.DESCRIPTION: warlock:Ritual. Retain. NL Gain [G] . If you retain this card lose !M! life and gain 1 Strength.

Ritualist:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Each time you play 5 cards gain [G].
Ritualist:Momentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Each time you play 5 cards gain [G].

Ritualist:CostlyStrength.DESCRIPTION: Lose up to 5 warlock:Attunement. Gain twice that much Strength next turn only. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:CostlyStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose up to 5 warlock:Attunement. Gain twice that much Strength for next turn only.

Ritualist:Sabbath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Ritual add !M! random card from your draw pile to your hand.

Ritualist:DeepReserves.NAME: Deep Reserves

Ritualist:SummonMaat.NAME: Summon Ma'at

Ritualist:SoulBurst.NAME: Soul Burst
Ritualist:SoulBurst.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Possession to all enemies, then apply !M! Possession to the target enemy.

Ritualist:HeavyInfection.NAME: Heavy Infection

Ritualist:RotInPieces.NAME: Rot In Pieces
Ritualist:RotInPieces.DESCRIPTION: Turn all enemies' Possession into Soul Rot. NL Soul Rot applies that much Possession at the start of each of their turns. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:SymbioteForm.NAME: Symbiote Form

Ritualist:SymbioteForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Summon slots. Summons refund half their warlock:Attunement cost and don't exhaust.

Ritualist:Extradition.NAME: Extradition

Ritualist:FuturePlans.NAME: Future Sight
Ritualist:FuturePlans.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Energy Gems into your draw pile. Energy Gems cost 0, gain you [G] , and draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:DevilWill.NAME: Devil's Will
Ritualist:DevilWill.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Draw cards from your discard pile until your hand is full. NL Exhaust.
